name: Resurrection Island
description:
Controls

  • A/D to move player left/right
  • SPACE to jump
  • CTRL to throw a bomb
  • R to restart at any point

Gameplay videos

Winning

Have no skeletons on the screen by blowing them up as quickly as possible. Their HP meters are above their heads.

Loosing

  • Die from taking enough damage (your HP meter is on top left).
  • Jump off the edge.

Bombs

  • Grow on trees.
  • Skeletons can also use them.

Ultimate design for this game

  • Melee attacks when no ammo.
  • Shooting after picking up bullets.
  • Coconuts are bombs, bananas are bullets. They grow on their respective trees.
  • Only exploded skeletons die.
  • If shot with a bullet, they die, but come back to life after a short time. (hence the name 'Resurrection' Island)
  • Shooting has a chance for a headshot insta-kill or a body part getting separated. Dismembered body parts grow into a full skeleton after a short time if not exploded.
  • Cool water shader and the skeletons will be slowly coming out of the sea after the player.
